Text.Value: *There is another. The abomination wrapped in flesh you saw in the colony. Orin.*
*By eradicating your siblings.*

EditorData.stateContext: The Dark Urge wakes up from their dream and is back in camp

Text.Value: *You are not the last of your name. Not yet.*
*Memories flood back - snatches of your story, written in the blood of a thousand victims.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge wakes up from their dream and is back in camp

Text.Value: *All is as you feared. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*
Revel in the memories of murder.
*It's time to go home.*
*Your heart pines for the love of your Lord.*
*Today is a wonderful day for murder.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge will always transform back into normal form in gameplay the second this cutscene is over.

Text.Value: *And yet you know you will never be free of your Urge if you don't confront your past.*
Surrender to the Urge. Perhaps it is time to embrace your heritage.
Shudder. This has gone too far.

EditorData.stateContext: The Dark Urge wakes up from their dream and is back in camp

Text.Value: *Dear sister must die by your hand, an offering in Bhaal's sanctum.*
*If you want to be free of your Urge, you must confront your past.*
*It's time for a family reunion.*
*The cruelty of the Slayer leaps around within.*
Recall that there was another - the woman beneath your feet.
All those deaths by your hand. How can you ever atone?
Recall that there was another - the woman who became the Slayer.
*You were their Master, and he was yours. A cruel Master, a Dread Lord... a devoted Father.*

EditorData.stateContext: Player sitting on their camp roll

Text.Value: Tense up. That may be what you were, but it is not who you are.
*Years spent in worship of Bhaal, leading his savage congregation in prayer, sacrifice, and slaughter.*
*All is greater than you could have dreamed. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*
*But be wary of your confessors. Will friend turn to foe, knowing what you are?*
*This is the truth lost in your mangled memories. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*

EditorData.stateContext: Player sitting on their camp roll

Synopsis:
The Dark Urge sees themselves and Orin in the Bhaal temple. Only one of them is given the Slayer form. The Butler of Bhaal is not present, but is the one giving the voiceover and information about what is happening. The icon of Bhaal looms over all. We see spectres of those we have had to kill, if we were on the Embracing track.
If we turn into the Slayer, it should automatically start the dialogue after this with Jaheira, if present, talking about the Slayer.
